Spell.Name: Single-Target Tower Flag
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Marks this tower as a single-target oriented tower, which allows it to learn Marksman upgrades. Marksman upgrades increase the range of a tower and reduce its attack delay.

Spell.Name: Caster Tower Flag
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Marks this tower as a spell oriented tower, which allows it to learn Channeling upgrades. Channeling upgrades increase the spell damage of a tower.

Spell.Name: Splash Tower Flag
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Marks this tower as a splash oriented tower, which allows it to learn Barrage upgrades. Barrage upgrades increase the splash radius and damage of a tower.

Spell.Name: Scatter Shot
Spell.Text: Active spell. This tower fires light projectiles, allowing it to fire twice as fast as it normally would. However, the damage dealt by each projectile is also halved.
Spell.Script: MOD SELF TOWER_DAMAGE_BONUS -50 PERCENT; MOD SELF TOWER_BAT_BONUS -50 PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Snipe spell, which allows this tower to fire projectiles at a much higher velocity. As a result, these projectiles cannot follow creeps but can sometimes pass through a creep that they hit, inflicting damage to any creeps behind it as well. Replaces Scatter Shot. Active spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +100% move speed, 25% chance 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +250% move speed, 50% chance 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +500% move speed, 75% chance 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +1000% move speed, 100% chance

Spell.Name: Snipe Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This projectile cannot follow creeps. However, it travels 100% faster, and can pass through any creeps that it hits 25% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Active spell. This tower fires high-velocity rounds at creeps that travel 100% faster than normal. These projectiles cannot follow their targets, but have a 25% chance to pass through any creep that they hit.

Spell.Name: Snipe Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This projectile cannot follow creeps. However, it travels 250% faster, and can pass through any creeps that it hits 50% of the time.

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text: Active spell. This tower fires high-velocity rounds at creeps that travel 250% faster than normal. These projectiles cannot follow their targets, but have a 50% chance to pass through any creep that they hit.

Spell.Name: Point Blank
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Point Blank spell, which allows this tower to inflict double damage whenever it attacks a creep that is within a certain distance from itself. Passive spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 64px radius 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 96px radius 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 128px radius

Spell.Name: Point Blank
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Whenever this tower attacks a creep that is within 64px from itself, its damage is doubled for that attack.

Spell.Name: Point Blank

Spell.Name: Point Blank

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Teleport spell, which allows this tower to bend space and instantly move to another, unoccupied location on the page. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 2 min. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1 min. cooldown

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. This tower bends space around it, allowing it to instantly move to a targeted, unoccupied location on the page. 2 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. This tower bends space around it, allowing it to instantly move to a targeted, unoccupied location on the page. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Singularity
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Singularity spell, which unleashes a vortex at the targeted location that draws in all creeps on the page. The vortex cannot be created on any location that normal creeps cannot access. Triggered spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1 charge

Spell.Name: Singularity
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Unleashes a vortex that draws in all creeps on the page to the targeted location. This location must be accessible to normal creeps, however.

Spell.Name: Chain Shot
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Chain Shot spell, which allows this tower to fire several projectiles at a time. Each projectile is lighter than normal however, and only inflicts 50% normal damage. Replaces Scatter Shot. Active spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 2 projectiles 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 3 projectiles 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 4 projectiles 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 5 projectiles

Spell.Name: Chain Shot

Spell.Name: Reload
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Reload spell, which instantly reloads this tower's weapons when they fire. This effectively allows it to fire twice on its next attack, but can only occur every few seconds. Passive spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 5 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 4 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 3 sec. cooldown

Spell.Name: Limiter Removal
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Limiter Removal spell, which temporarily removes all safety and control measures from this tower. As a result, this tower attacks 10x faster than it normally would for a short amount of time. 1 minute cooldown. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 5 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 8 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Limiter Removal Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This tower attacks 10x faster for 5 seconds.

Spell.Name: Limiter Removal
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Removes all safety and control measures from this tower for the next five seconds, allowing it to attack 10x faster. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Limiter Removal Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This tower attacks 10x faster for 8 seconds.

Spell.Name: Limiter Removal
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Removes all safety and control measures from this tower for the next eight seconds, allowing it to attack 10x faster. 1 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Piercing Rounds
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Piercing Rounds spell, which replaces the ammunition of this tower with specialized, armor-piercing rounds. These projectiles reduce the armor of any creep that they hit for a short amount of time. Passive spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - -1 armor, 3 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Piercing Rounds Projectile Trigger
Spell.Text: Passive spell. When this projectile hits a creep, that creep's armor is reduced by 1 for 3 seconds.

Spell.Name: Piercing Rounds
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This tower fires specialized, armor-piercing rounds instead of normal projectiles. Whenever a projectile from this tower hits a creep, that creep's armor is reduced by 1 for 3 seconds.

Spell.Name: Fluidity
Spell.Text: Active spell. The fluid nature of this tower causes it to gain a random bonus to damage between -25% and +50% whenever it fires. This bonus is not cumulative.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Inkpool spell, which allows this tower to fire large blots of ink that stick to the page when they explode. Creeps that walk over them take damage over time, but the blots lose their effectiveness as they fade. Each blot lasts for 2 seconds. Replaces Fluidity. Active spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +379 damage/sec. maximum 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +762 damage/sec. maximum 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +1590 damage/sec. maximum 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +3395 damage/sec. maximum

Spell.Name: Overflow
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Overflow spell, which floods the area surrounding this tower with sticky ink. While active, this spell creates an Inkpool every 0.1 seconds on a nearby location, but also prevents this tower from firing. The level of Inkpool created is dependent on the level of Overflow. 30 second cooldown. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - Inkpool Lv3 used, 10 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - Inkpool Lv4 used, 12 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - Inkpool Lv5 used, 15 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Overflow Tower Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This tower cannot fire while under the effects of Overflow. Lasts for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Overflow
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Floods the surrounding page in ink, creating an Inkpool Lv3 around this tower every 0.1 seconds for 10 seconds. During that time, this tower is unable to fire. 30 second cooldown.
Spell.Script: APPLY_SPELL 80 SELF SELF; ADD_GOBJECT 5 (GET POSITION SELF) SELF;

Spell.Text: Passive spell. This tower cannot fire while under the effects of Overflow. Lasts for 12 seconds.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Splash Aura spell, which increases the splash radius of all towers within 128px. This spell does not stack with itself, or affect the inherent splash radius of any projectile. Passive spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +50% splash 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +100% splash

Spell.Name: Splash Aura Projectile Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Increases this projectile's splash radius by 50%.

Spell.Name: Splash Aura Tower Effect

Spell.Name: Splash Aura

Spell.Text: Passive spell. Increases this tower's splash radius by 100%.

Spell.Name: Flashflood
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Flashflood spell, which summons a torrential surge of water that washes over the entire page. All creeps on the page take damage based on the number of creeps damaged by this spell. 2 min. cooldown. Triggered spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1.5% max. HP damage per creep

Spell.Name: Flashflood
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Summons a torrential surge of water that floods the page, inflicting 1.5% max. HP damage to every creep on the page per creep that was damaged by this effect. 2 minute cooldown.

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Steam Cannon spell, which allows this tower to fire a steady stream of high-pressure steam instead of ink every 0.01 seconds. However, the steam is not very powerful and only inflicts a small fraction of this tower's normal damage. Replaces Fluidity. Active spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 1% normal damage 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 2% normal damage 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 3% normal damage 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 4% normal damage

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text: Active spell. This tower fires high-pressure steam every 0.01 seconds that inflicts 1% normal damage.

Spell.Name: Steam Cannon
Spell.Text: Active spell. This tower fires high-pressure steam every 0.01 seconds that inflicts 4% normal damage.

Spell.Name: Rupture
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Rupture spell, which triggers a minor explosion in a targeted creep. The explosion inflicts this tower's base damage plus a bonus, and reduces that creep's armor for 10 seconds. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +82 damage, -2 armor, 5 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +157 damage, -3 armor, 4 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +319 damage, -5 armor, 3 sec. cooldown

Spell.Name: Rupture
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Detonates a targeted creep, inflicting 82 + base damage to it and reducing its armor by 2 for 10 seconds. 5 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Vaporize
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Vaporize spell, which allows projectiles from this tower to dissipate any armor that they come in contact with. As a result, projectiles from this tower ignore a percentage of a creep's armor upon striking. Passive spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 50% armor ignore 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 100% armor ignore

Spell.Name: Vaporize Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This projectile ignores 50% of a creep's armor.

Spell.Name: Vaporize Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This projectile ignores 100% of a creep's armor.

Spell.Name: Vaporize

Spell.Name: Boiling Point
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Boiling Point spell, which superheats projectiles from this tower before firing them. As a result, these projectiles gain a fixed amount of damage. This increase in damage is not affected by other effects that modify damage. Passive spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +25 damage

Spell.Name: Boiling Point Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This projectile inflicts an additional 25 damage.

Spell.Name: Boiling Point

Spell.Name: Deafen Effect
Spell.Text: Passive spell. This creep moves 3% slower for 15 seconds.

Spell.Name: Deafen
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Releases a deafening wave of sound that inflicts 115 + normal damage and slows every creep that it hits by 3% for every Clock Tower on the page, up to a maximum of 75% slow. This slowing effect lasts for 15 seconds. If any creep with an immunity is affected by this spell, then the slow effect on that creep becomes 75% regardless of the number of Clock Towers on the page.

Spell.Name: Stasis
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Stasis spell, which rips a single creep out of spacetime for a short amount of time. During that time, the creep is unable to move but can still be damaged. Replaces Deafen. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 1 sec. stun, 3 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 3 sec. stun, 5 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 6 sec. stun, 8 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 10 sec. stun, 10 sec. cooldown

Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Rips a single creep out of the fabric of spacetime, rendering it unable to move for 1 second. 3 second cooldown.

Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Wax Time spell, which accelerates time around this tower for 30 seconds. All creeps and projectiles within 192px move faster, and all towers within 192px have a reduced attack delay while this spell is active. 5 minute cooldown. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 100% increased speed, -50% attack delay 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 200% increased speed, -60% attack delay

Spell.Name: Whiteout
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Whiteout ability, which cleanses every creep on the page of all armor, active effects, and speed bonuses for as long as they remain on the page. Triggered spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 3 min. cooldown

Spell.Name: Redemption Effect

&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 20x normal damage

Spell.Name: Helios Descendent
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Helios Descendent ability, which increases this tower's damage whenever it kills a creep. This ability is retroactive with previous creep kills from this tower. Passive spell.

Spell.Name: Lux Lucis
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Lux Lucis ability, which increases the Light Counter for as long as this tower remains on the page. Spell.Name: Smite
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Smite ability, which invokes the wrath from above on a targeted creep. That creep suffers damage equal to 5% of its maximum HP and is slowed by 5% for every 50 points of damage that this tower has, up to a certain limit. The slowing effect lasts for 10 seconds. 10 second cooldown. Replaces Redemption. Triggered spell.

&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 100% max HP. damage, 60% max slow

&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 250% max HP. damage, 80% max slow

Spell.Name: Truefaith
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Truefaith ability, which randomly redeems a fraction of all creeps on the page. Redeemed creeps give ink when they escape, but also take ink when they are killed. 2 charges per level. Triggered spell.

Spell.Name: Apotheosis
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Apotheosis ability, which grants demi-godhood to any single tower on the page for 10 seconds. While under the effect of Apotheosis, that tower's damage is dramatically increased. 1 charge per level. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +1000% damage 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +2000% damage

Spell.Name: Apotheosis Effect

Spell.Name: Apotheosis

Spell.Name: Hallowing Light
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Hallowing Light ability, which temporarily floods the page with divine light. All towers deal increased damage for the duration, but the bounty of all creeps on the page also becomes 0 until the effect ends. 1 charge per level. Triggered spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +100% damage, 30 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Stigmata Slow Effect

Spell.Name: Stigmata
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Brands a creep with a mark of doom, causing it to move 25% slower and inflict 250 damage per second to all creeps within 32px around it, including itself, until it is removed from the page. This tower does not receive kill credit for any creeps killed through this effect.

Spell.Name: Life Tap
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Life Tap ability, which curses all creeps within 64px of the targeted location, causing them to grant a fixed amount of ink. This spell does not affect the bounty of these creeps. Replaces Stigmata. Triggered spell.

Grants this tower the Decrepify ability, which curses all creeps within 64px of the targeted location, causing them to take 50% more damage and move 50% slower. Only useable when Amplify Damage is on cooldown. Triggered spell.

Spell.Name: Corpse Explosion
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Corpse Explosion spell, which causes a single creep on the page to violently explode, killing it instantly. All other creeps within 64px of this creep take damage as well. This spell does NOT ignore creep immunities. Only useable when Decrepify is on cooldown. Triggered spell. \n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 70-120% max. HP damage, 15 sec. cooldown

Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Causes a single creep on the page to explode violently, killing it instantly. All other creeps within 64px of that creep take 70-120% of their maximum HP as damage. This spell does NOT ignore creep immunities. Only useable when Decrepify is on cooldown. 15 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Upheaval
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Summons chaotic forces that randomly change the maximum HP of every creep on the page by -50 to 50% of their current maximum HP. If this would bring a creep's current HP higher than its maximum HP, its current HP is lowered to match its new maximum HP.

Spell.Name: Martyrdom
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Martyrdom ability, which sacrifices a single creep on the page to give all other creeps on the page maximum HP based on the maximum HP of the sacrificed creep. The sacrficed creep does not count as a killed creep. 30 sec. cooldown. Replaces Upheaval. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - 1x maximum HP 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 2x maximum HP 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 3x maximum HP 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 4x maximum HP

Spell.Name: Martyrdom
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Sacrifices a single creep on the page, giving every other creep on the page maximum HP equal to the maximum HP of the sacrificed creep. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Martyrdom
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Sacrifices a single creep on the page, giving every other creep on the page maximum HP equal to twice the maximum HP of the sacrificed creep. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Martyrdom
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Sacrifices a single creep on the page, giving every other creep on the page maximum HP equal to triple the maximum HP of the sacrificed creep. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Martyrdom
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Sacrifices a single creep on the page, giving every other creep on the page maximum HP equal to four times the maximum HP of the sacrificed creep. 30 second cooldown.

Spell.Name: Soul Taker
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Soul Taker ability, which allows this tower to steal the soul of a weakened creep on the page, killing it instantly. This ability ignores creep immunities. 10 sec. cooldown. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - <15% maximum HP 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - <25% maximum HP 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - <40% maximum HP

Spell.Name: Soul Taker

Spell.Name: Soul Taker

Spell.Name: Memento Mori
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Memento Mori ability, which forces every creep on the page to comprehend its own mortality. Every creep on the page suffers damage based on the difference between its current HP and maximum HP. If this damage would kill a creep, that creep remains at 1 HP instead. This spell ignores creep immunities. 1 charge per level. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 75% difference 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 100% difference

Spell.Name: Memento Mori
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Demonstrates the mortality of every creep on the page, causing each one to suffer damage equal to 75% of the difference between their current HP and maximum HP. If this damage would kill a creep, it remains at 1 HP instead. This spell ignores creep immunities.

Spell.Name: Memento Mori
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Demonstrates the mortality of every creep on the page, causing each one to suffer damage equal to 100% of the difference between their current HP and maximum HP. If this damage would kill a creep, it remains at 1 HP instead. This spell ignores creep immunities.

Spell.Name: Borrowed Time
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Borrowed Time spell, which increases the maximum HP of every creep that is currently on the page. However, any creep that gains maximum HP through this effect also loses maximum HP over the course of one minute. If a creep has its maximum HP brought below zero with this effect, this tower gets kill credit. 1 charge per level. Triggered spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +100000 maximum HP, -2000 max. HP/sec.

Spell.Text: Passive spell. Indicates that this creep has been affected by Borrowed Time.

Spell.Name: Borrowed Time
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Every creep that is currently on the page gains 100000 max. HP, but loses 2000 max. HP every second for 1 minute. If a creep has its max. HP brought below zero with this effect, this tower gets kill credit.

Spell.Name: The Seven
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower one of seven vice or one of seven virtue spells at random. Vice spells decrease the Light Counter by 1, and Virtue spells increase the Light Counter by 1, but each spell has its own individual effects. Not all of them are beneficial. Replaces Upheaval. Active spells.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - See individual spells for effects 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - See individual spells for effects 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - See individual spells for effects 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - See individual spells for effects

Spell.Name: Spellsnatch
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Spellsnatch ability, which allows this tower to learn a single spell from another, targeted tower. If successful, this tower permanently loses the ability to cast Spellsnatch and learns the selected spell. Lv1 spells and those already known by this tower cannot be learned through this spell. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - Abilities up to Lv3 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - Abilities up to Lv4 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - Abilities up to Lv5

Spell.Name: Spellsnatch
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Randomly selects an ability known by another, targeted tower and attempts to learn it. If successful, this tower permanently loses the ability to cast Spellsnatch and learns the selected spell. All spells up to Lv3 are valid, except for Lv1 spells and those already known by this tower.

Spell.Name: Mirage
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Mirage ability, which summons an illusionary duplicate of this tower on an empty location on the page that is invisible to most creeps. The duplicate tower has all of the abilities of this tower (except Mirage), but cannot inflict projectile damage. After a certain amount of time, the illusionary tower will disappear. 1 charge per level. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 30 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1 min. duration

Spell.Script: SET SELF TOWER_GHOST_STATE TRUE FLAT; SET SELF TOWER_DAMAGE_BONUS 0 FLAT;
